page.title: 20STOW'S DOMESDAY RESEARCHERS
page.content: Suitable acknowledgement must be made to the children of classes 2 & 3 in Stow Junior School who have worked to gather this information. Thank you, then, to: Kerrie and Terrie Barber, Emma Clifford, Joanne Evison, Angela Gibson, Leonie Glaisyer, Angela Green, Emma Hobbs, Judith Lal, Esther Ricketts, Muriel Swift, Charlotte Wilson, Michael Ayers, David Brookes, Matthew Close, Seth Dixon, Justin Foster, David Gardner, Kerrie O'Loughlin (Cl.3), Sarah Arthurs, Michelle Betteridge, Daniella Bullwinkel, Hayley Dyer, Dawn Giffin, Alison Goode, Charis Kelly, Deborah Ricketts, Joanna Spedding, Rebecca Watkins, Nicholas Beston, Steven Bolter, Robert Griffiths, Paul Huckson, David Little, Gary Pulham, Richard Walford and Martyn Wilson (Cl.2)
